original_text: As we run, we must always look towards Jesus. He is the one who trusted God completely. Our faith starts with him, and he will help us to trust God all the way to the end. Jesus accepted punishment on the cross. He chose to receive much pain. He did not think about being ashamed to die like that. He knew that God had prepared something very good for him that would make him happy. Now he has sat down at the right side of God to rule with him in heaven.
korean_text: 믿음의 주요 또 온전하게 하시는 이인 예수를 바라보자 그는 그 앞에 있는 기쁨을 위하여 십자가를 참으사 부끄러움을 개의치 아니하시더니 하나님 보좌 우편에 앉으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: As we run, we must always look towards Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 달려갈 때, 우리는 항상 예수님을 향해 바라보아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He is the one who trusted God completely.
and he will help us to trust God all the way to the end.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리가 끝까지 하나님을 신뢰하도록 도와주실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus accepted punishment on the cross.
He chose to receive much pain.
He did not think about being ashamed to die like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그렇게 죽는 것이 부끄러운 것이라고 생각하지 않으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He knew that God had prepared something very good for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 하나님께서 자신을 위해 아주 좋은 것을 예비하셨다는 것을 알았습니다.
그것이 그분을 기쁘게 할 것이라는 것을 알았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now he has sat down at the right side of God
to rule with him in heaven.
